article.title: Thales Wins Contract To Supply The Swedish Military With A Next-Generation Tactical Communications Infrastructure
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The Swedish Defence Materiel Administration has awarded Thales a contract to equip the Swedish armed forces with an advanced Internet protocol-based tactical communications infrastructure under the KomNod Program. The Thales system will provide a variety of communications services such as a radio gateway, telephony, alarms, routing, Ethernet, intercom and management services.
